lexUnit.name: believe.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: have religious faith (in the truth or existence of)

sentence.text: I call it , I Believe in Angels .

Yes , I believe in Jesus , but sometimes I wake up in the night just petrified . "

Christians believe that when a person meets Jesus they can turn their back on the past and return to a life with God .
Certainly Christians believe that compassion and love are qualities that Jesus possessed .
Hindus believe in an endless cycle of creation and destruction .
Christians believe not only in celibacy outside marriage , but chastity , or faithfulness , within it .

I once helped a lady to believe in the Devil by playing devil 's advocate .

I believe in the divinity of Christ …

Nevertheless it is indisputable that all the early church fathers believed in the Devil as the Evil One , although it was never found necessary to define him in the way we must do so about God .
